meta.title: School Closing Information - Potlatch School District #285

link.title: Logger Athletics and Activities - News

form.name: aspnetForm

div.p: The Idaho State Board of Education met and made the recommendation/decision to continue the “soft closure” order for Idaho school districts through the remainder of this school year. That means, at this time, the rest of the school year for our students will be completed in the comfort of their home. This is truly an unprecedented event in our lives but our district will continue to provide as many services as we can that will help our students, and you, our parents and guardians, in order to get through this process. The Board and administration will be in discussion about the various Spring events that usually bring closure to our school years, such as Graduation. We will be looking at alternative dates, as well as alternative activities, that will allow us the opportunity to celebrate these wonderful, traditional events.

span.p: The Idaho State Board of Education met and made the recommendation/decision to continue the “soft closure” order for Idaho school districts through the remainder of this school year. That means, at this time, the rest of the school year for our students will be completed in the comfort of their home. This is truly an unprecedented event in our lives but our district will continue to provide as many services as we can that will help our students, and you, our parents and guardians, in order to get through this process. The Board and administration will be in discussion about the various Spring events that usually bring closure to our school years, such as Graduation. We will be looking at alternative dates, as well as alternative activities, that will allow us the opportunity to celebrate these wonderful, traditional events.

div.label: Translate Page

div.class: hidden-xs col-sm-4 col-md-4 col-lg-3 border-right border-bottom

span.span: In the event it becomes necessary to close school due to extreme weather conditions, electrical failure, etc., students and parents are advised to listen to the radio and television stations listed below. Information will also be posted on the website at www.psd285.org as well as on the the websites of the television stations listed below. We have also recently added the Lewiston Tribune web site to our list of contacts.
The decision to close will generally be made by 7:00 a.m. It should be assumed that school will operate as usual.
Please do not call the school for information.

div.div:
This is a secure Staff Intranet content page and cannot be viewed by the public. Please contact your Technology Director to gain access to the Staff Intranet area in order to view this page.
Thank you,
